  • Package vivae.arena

    • Class vivae.arena.Arena extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • shouldStop

          boolean shouldStop

        • loopSleepTime

          int loopSleepTime
          Thread sleep time in milliseconds.

        • worldStepsPerLoop

          int worldStepsPerLoop
          Number of steps the physical world takes in one iteration of the main loop.

        • totalStepsPerSimulation

          int totalStepsPerSimulation
          Maximum number of steps before VIVAE stops.

        • stepsDone

          int stepsDone

        • screenWidth

          int screenWidth
          Screen width.

          Screen height.

        • walls

          java.util.Vector<E> walls
          Vector of Walls as Fixed objects in the arena.

          java.util.Vector<E> passives

        • surfaces

          java.util.Vector<E> surfaces
          Vector of Surfaces in the arena.

        • actives

          java.util.Vector<E> actives
          Vector of Active objects in the arena.

        • vivaes

          java.util.Vector<E> vivaes
          Vector of all VivaeObjects in the arena.

        • isAllArenaPartsAntialiased

          boolean isAllArenaPartsAntialiased
          sets up if the parts of the arena are panited antialiased..

        • isObjectsOnSightBlinking

          boolean isObjectsOnSightBlinking
          sets up if the objects on sight of the sensors are blinking.

        • bufferGraphics

          java.awt.Graphics2D bufferGraphics
          Buffer Graphics for doublebuffering.

        • offscreen

          java.awt.Image offscreen
          Off Screen image for doublebuffering.

        • controllers

          java.util.Vector<E> controllers
          a Vector of the registered controllers.

        • parent

          java.awt.Component parent
          A parent window where the arena will be painted on.

        • svgDoc

          org.w3c.dom.svg.SVGDocument svgDoc
          The output svg document.

        • svgGraphics

          org.apache.batik.svggen.SVGGraphics2D svgGraphics
          The output svg graphic canvas.

        • isSVGGraphicsInitialized

          boolean isSVGGraphicsInitialized
          A boolean deciding whether an output to SVG is possible.

        • isRunning

          boolean isRunning
          Determines whether the simulation is running or not.

        • isVisible

          boolean isVisible
          Switches on and off the visual output.

        • svgOutputFileName

          java.lang.String svgOutputFileName
          Implicit name of the output SVG file.

        • frictionBuffer

          FrictionBuffer frictionBuffer
          Intern buffer for making friction calculations faster.
